tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"僵尸守卫召唤","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['[{"text":"按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}, " 在身边生成两只手持石剑的僵尸守卫。"]','{"text":"僵尸守卫在场时，召唤师获得抗性提升 3 。","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"（伤害减免 60 %）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"僵尸攻击力为 5 点，移动速度比玩家略慢，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"生命值为 20 点（每秒自然流失 3 点）。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"可以触发辉煌裂片。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"20 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 个","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
